column4: hi there. I have ubuntu 7.04 installed and I'm experiencing problems with my keyboard.
have you got the same problem?
yeah same one here just delete and install windows 98
i don't understand. I don't have windows and don't want to install it
what have windows have to do with ubuntu?
yeah the stupid shift key was all messing up...98 fixed it
i can't belive/understand how can Windows 98 solve this problem!
try it ... i didn't believe it either
but i will have to repartition my whole disk
